description:
gc: handle function calls in arguments to builtin complex operations.

Fixes issue 2582

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5574044/diff/5001/test/fixedbugs/bug398.go
File test/fixedbugs/bug398.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5574044/diff/5001/test/fixedbugs/bug398.go#newcode12
test/fixedbugs/bug398.go:12: for false {}  // force outlining
// avoid inlining

outlining is something else entirely.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=882ec620945a ***

Fixes issue 2582
